overview: The first and longest running women-only striptease show in history! Every week for three years at a lesbian bar in San Francisco, over 100 erotic performance artists danced into the hearts and clits of more than 10,000 women. Fatale has captured some of the exciting moments from this memorable event, live on two video cassettes, BurLEZk Live! and BurLEZk Live 2.
title: BurLEZk Live!
